items.name: alpaca-market-data
items.description: Check stock prices, crypto quotes, option chains, and market history via Alpaca.

items.name: apple-calendar
items.description: Create, edit, delete, and search calendar events in Apple Calendar on macOS. Use for "add a meeting", "what's on my calendar", or "move my 3pm".

items.name: apple-notes
items.description: Create, search, edit, and manage Apple Notes on macOS.

items.name: apple-reminders
items.description: Add, edit, complete, and list reminders on macOS via remindctl. Use for "remind me to…", "show my todos", or "mark X done".

items.name: aviation-stack-flight-tracker
items.description: Track live flight status, delays, gates, and position. Use for "track AA100", "is my flight on time?", or "where is BA123 right now?".

items.name: aviation-weather
items.description: Fetch airport weather (METAR, TAF, PIREPs) for flight planning and briefings. Use for "weather at KJFK", "TAF for EGLL", or pre-flight weather checks.

items.name: cloudflare-deploy
items.description: Deploy to Cloudflare Workers, tunnels, DNS and Pages.

items.name: discord
items.description: Send messages, manage channels, run polls, and moderate in Discord.

items.name: docx
items.description: Create, edit, and analyze Word documents (.docx) — formatting, tracked changes, comments, and text extraction.

items.name: figma
items.description: Fetch designs, screenshots, variables, and assets from Figma and translate them to code. Use for "implement this Figma design", "grab assets from Figma", or design-to-code tasks.

items.name: flight-search
items.description: Search flights by route, date, and price on Google Flights.

items.name: gog-google-workspace-cli-for-gmail-drive-sheets-docs
items.description: Read and send Gmail, manage Drive, edit Sheets and Docs, search Contacts.

items.name: google-ads
items.description: Manage and optimize Google Ads / Adwords — performance, campaigns, spend, conversions.

items.name: google-calendar
items.description: List, create, update, and delete Google Calendar events.

items.name: goplaces
items.description: Look up places, reviews, and details via Google Places. Use for "find coffee shops near me", "reviews for X restaurant", or "what's the address of Y?".

items.name: hubspot
items.description: Manage HubSpot contacts, companies, deals, and content. Use for "add a contact", "update the deal stage", or "pull company info from HubSpot".

items.name: huggingface
items.description: Download models and datasets, manage repos, and run inference on Hugging Face.

items.name: meta-ads
items.description: Manage Meta/Facebook ad campaigns — create, edit, and check performance.

items.name: mlx-whisper
items.description: Local speech-to-text with MLX Whisper (Apple Silicon optimized, no API key).

items.name: nano-banana-pro
items.description: Generate or edit images using AI (Gemini 2.0 Flash). Use for "create an image of…", "edit this photo", or "generate a logo".

items.name: nest-devices
items.description: Control Nest thermostat, cameras, and doorbell. Use for "set temperature to 24", "show front door camera", or "who's at the door?".

items.name: notion
items.description: Create and manage Notion pages, databases, and blocks via API. Use for "add a page to Notion", "query my database", or "update that Notion doc".

items.name: notion-knowledge-capture
items.description: Capture conversations and decisions into structured Notion pages.

items.name: notion-meeting-intelligence
items.description: Prepare meeting agendas and materials from Notion context.

items.name: notion-research-documentation
items.description: Research across Notion and synthesize into briefs, comparisons, or reports.

items.name: notion-spec-to-implementation
items.description: Turn Notion specs/PRDs into implementation plans and tasks.

items.name: parakeet-mlx
items.description: Local speech-to-text with Parakeet MLX (ASR) for Apple Silicon (no API key).

items.name: pptx
items.description: Create, edit, and analyze PowerPoint presentations (.pptx) — layouts, speaker notes, comments, and content extraction.

items.name: price-tracker
items.description: Monitor and compare product prices across Amazon, eBay, Walmart, and Best Buy.

items.name: render-deploy
items.description: Deploy and host full-stack web applications on Render platform.

items.name: spotify-player
items.description: Play, pause, search, and queue music on Spotify from the terminal. Use for "play some jazz", "skip this song", or "search for…".

items.name: steam
items.description: Browse and filter your Steam game library — recommendations, playtime, Steam Deck compatibility.

items.name: supabase
items.description: Run SQL queries, store data, and do vector/similarity search on Supabase. Use for "save this to the database", "search similar items", or "create a table".

items.name: tauri-cli-api
items.description: Build, run, and manage Tauri desktop/mobile apps — init, dev, build, bundle, plugins, and signing. Use for "start my Tauri app", "build for iOS", or "add a plugin".

items.name: trello
items.description: Manage Trello boards, lists, and cards. Use for "create a card", "move task to Done", or "show my Trello board".

items.name: vapi-voice-call
items.description: Place outbound phone calls with transcripts via Vapi.

items.name: vercel-deploy
items.description: Deploy and host full-stack web applications on Vercel platform.

items.name: wacli
items.description: Send WhatsApp messages to contacts or search/sync chat history via wacli CLI. Not for replying in live user conversations.

items.name: weather
items.description: Get current weather and forecasts for any location (no API key). Use for "what's the weather?", "will it rain tomorrow?", or "forecast for Bangkok".

items.name: weight-loss
items.description: Track weight loss journey with weigh-ins, trend analysis, and goal milestones

items.name: whatsapp-styler
items.description: Format outgoing WhatsApp messages for clean mobile reading — proper WhatsApp syntax, no markdown bloat.

items.name: workout
items.description: Log body workouts, track sets, and analyze strength progression.

items.name: xlsx
items.description: Create, edit, and analyze spreadsheets (.xlsx, .csv) — formulas, formatting, data analysis, and visualization.
